bill.title: Virtual school programs; provide standards and funding for virtual school instruction in all school districts.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 37-161-3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide Standards For The Mississippi Virtual Public School Program In All School Districts; To Revise The Definition Of The Term "virtual Instruction Program"; To Revise School District Requirements For Providing Virtual Instruction Programs; To Require Full-time And Part-time Virtual Instruction Program Options; To Amend Section 37-151-7, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Redefine The Term "full-time Equivalent Student" As It Applies To The Mississippi Virtual School Under The Mississippi Adequate Education Program; And To Provide Instruction, Eligibility, Funding, Assessment And Accountability Requirements; To Amend Section 37-16-7, Mississippi Code Of 1972, Requiring At Least One Course Required For High School Graduation To Be Completed Through Online Learning; To Authorize School Districts To Offer Virtual Courses And Blended Learning Courses; To Authorize Creation Of Innovation Schools And Innovation Zones Focused On Science, Technology, Engineering And Mathematics In School Districts; To Authorize The State Board Of Education To Develop An Application Process And Standards To Be Administered By The Local School Boards; To Amend Section 37-17-11; Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Conform; And For Related Purposes.
